name: POOL PARTY PUMMEL
description:
Pool Party Pummel is a local 1v1 game of chicken fight where you must anticipate the right moment to attack and dodge your opponent while being in a continuous deadlock. The first one to successfully knock the other off their bird claims victory.

devlog

Developed by Madeline Falacci, Aaron Keeth, Kong Huang, and Jenny Jiao Hsia.
